title: EIPIP Meeting 94
body:
# Date and Time

Nov 15, 2023 at 15:30 UTC
# Location

Zoom: TBA in the Discord #eip-editing channel

YouTube Live Stream/Recording: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxpLrRIkDlBjDUUrGgF91pQw

# Agenda
### 1. Discuss Open Issues/PRs, and other topics
- [ ] EIP-ERC repo split
  - [Pending tasks for ERC migration](https://github.com/ethereum/ERCs/issues/1) 
  - [Migrating Pull Requests from ethereum/EIPs to ethereum/ERCs](https://github.com/ethereum/ERCs/issues/8)
- [ ] Web Page Rendering for EIP & ERC
- [ ] Topic Group
 - [EIP Editors & Associates](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1VaazpOfy4v2wXKvrCIEiU9zhGS9jV522KoonqZR9DrA/edit#gid=0) based on repo split.

#### Call for Input

Call For Input | Status | Result | Comments
-- | -- | -- | --
https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/283 | Open | - | Active for collecting responses (till Nov 16)
https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/286 | Open | - | Active for collecting responses (till Nov 19)
https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/287 | Open | - | Active for collecting responses (till Nov 19)
https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/289 | Open | - | Active for collecting responses (till Nov 14)


#### Changes to `Final` proposals
- [ ] https://github.com/ethereum/ERCs/pull/49
- [ ] https://github.com/ethereum/ERCs/pull/57
- [ ] https://github.com/ethereum/ERCs/pull/66 | https://github.com/ethereum/ERCs/pull/74 | https://github.com/ethereum/ERCs/pull/75 | https://github.com/ethereum/ERCs/pull/76
- [ ] update ERC1271 Ref [comment](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/285#issuecomment-1788105803) @frangio
- [ ] [Post EIP/ERC Split: Represent each side as Camps in Ethereum Magicians](https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/post-eip-erc-split-represent-each-side-as-camps-in-ethereum-magicians/16271) @NetWalker108 
- [ ] https://github.com/ethereum/ERCs/pull/61 (Draft proposition for ERC-1) @Joachim-Lebrun


Manual Merge
_TBA_

### 2. Discussion continued or updates from past meetings
_TBA_


### 3. EIPs Insight - Monthly EIPs status reporting.
- [Hackmd](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/EthereumImprovementProposalsInsight/https%3A%2F%2Feipsinsight.com%2Finsight%2F2023%2F10)
- [EIPsInsight.com](https://eipsinsight.com/insight/2023/10)

### 4. [EIP Editing Office Hour](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/EIPEditingOfficeHour)
- Can we merge All ERC Dev Meeting & EIP Editing Office Hour?
- Rename it to ERC Office Hour?
- Agenda [Meeting 27]

### 5. Review action items from earlier meetings
- [Summary meeting 93](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/285#issuecomment-1789769529)

### 6. Announcement
